title: Equinox

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- (First) Vaporize a player and their house, dealing a Powerful attack to them and everyone targeting them, astral or not.
- (Second) Draw the moon over someone's house at night, canceling all non-astral abilities used against them.
- (Third) Redirect two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who survives your Vaporize attack will be roleblocked the next night.
- You ignore Redirection immunity.

desc:
Post 1286
*Nothing will be left.*
Redirect Immune (While Third)
Control Immune (While Third)
